lg.head: Life.
lg.l: TheEver theundiscouraged, resolute soul of man;
Ever the grappled mysteryâ€”ever the same in all known earth's ages old or new,
Ever the eager eyes, hurrahs, the welcome clappy hands and the loud applause;
Ever the busy busy curious brain struggling to solve the problem.
